item.description:
Dear Meditators -
Because of your  interest in meditation and awakening, I encourage you to attend this program happening on Saturday. You will love the energy of Divine Openings. I'll be talking more about Divine Openings in the Sunday meditation classes but this longer program will be wonderful, and the book you will receive is a well-written guide to enlightenment and manifestation.  I hope to see you there this Saturday.
Judy

Divine Openings with Anne Bellieveau Saturday, May 12, 1-5 pm $75 (includes book)
(Fee includes $29 Divine Openings Book) Pro-rated if you already have the book
Please pre-register at annebelliveau@gmail.com. 

 Receive the gift of Divine Grace, the Energy of Light, Intelligence, Information which opens you to the Joy, Peace and Love that is your true Essence. Divine Openings will be given to each person by both Anne and Judy, Divine Openings Givers. Bask in the Sacred Sound of singing bowls, Celtic harp and Awakened voice.

Experience the power of Divine Grace

Awaken and accelerate spiritual energy for heightened consciousness and advanced spiritual evolution. This powerful energy transmission initiates spiritual enlightenment and opens a path of ease beyond seeking. Practical shifts in relationships, health, finances, and every aspect of daily life occur naturally as a result of shedding old habits of resistance and stabilizing at higher and higher vibrations.

Connect deeply with yourself: Reawaken to the Presence within you and become inspired to your own Inner Guidance. Learn how you can access your own Guidance anytime, anywhere. Release stress, struggle, limiting belief systems and old negative patterns. Discover easy tools for soothing the “monkey mind” and opening to the wisdom of your Larger Self.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Divine Openings
